sqlMap.select: select BRANCH_ID,1,(BRANCH_ID) || ' - ' ||BRANCH_NAME,DISABLE,BRANCH_ID as SORT_PRIORITY from PTRBUSINESS_UNIT where (DISABLE = 0 or disable is null) union select cast(null as varchar(20)),0,'Select one option',0,' ' as SORT_PRIORITY from SYSIBM.SYSDUMMY1 order by SORT_PRIORITY

select cast(null as bigint) as work_list_id, 'Please Select' as work_list_name, -1 as sort union select work_list_id, work_list_name, 0 as sort from ptrwork_list where (disable is null or disable = false) order by sort

select cast(null as bigint) as notice_type_id, 'Please Select' as description, -1 as sort union select id as NOTICE_TYPE_ID, description, 0 as sort from ptrnotice_type_ref where (disable is null or disable = false) order by sort

select cast(null as bigint) as id, 'Please Select' as description, -1 as sort union select id as id, description, 0 as sort from ptrproduct_type_ref where (disable is null or disable = false) order by sort

select cast(null as bigint) as id, 'Please Select' as description, -1 as sort union select id as id, description, 0 as sort from ptrproduct_type_category_ref where (disable is null or disable = false) order by sort

select cast(null as bigint) as id, 'Please Select' as description, -1 as sort union select id as id, description, 0 as sort from ptrbank_branch_ref where (disable is null or disable = false) order by sort

select cast(null as bigint) as id, 'Please Select' as description, -1 as sort union select id as id, description, 0 as sort from ptrtreatment_type_status_ref where (disable is null or disable = false) and type_id = 8 order by sort
select cast(null as bigint) as id, 'Please Select' as description, -1 as sort union select id as id, description, 0 as sort from ptruser_team where (disable is null or disable = false) order by sort
select 'Please Select' as USER_ID, -1 as sort union select user_id as USER_ID, 0 as sort from ptruser where (disable is null or disable = false) order by sort, user_id asc
